issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

comments.body:
[~nilmarpublio@gmail.com] can you please be more specific here? did you find a bug? if so, please attach a test case and steps to reproduce, in the other hand if you have questions related LiveView, please post them in community.appcelerator.com

Best

Unfortunately, the comunity page was not available.

All details that I have is it:

I could run the application on device using this command line:    appc run -p android -T device
  
But I thisk that it is not a better solution.
